name: Temple Endless Run
description:
Get the high scores and complete differ excited tasks, Use props as the score, coins magnet and so on!

Lost Temple OZ Run is a free fun and addictive temple themed game! Challenge endless distance, Get high scores. Run as fast as you can, Dash, rush in the endless tunnel. Jump, slide, move left or right to avoid the obstacles.

Lost temple endless run begins:

.Full of risks of kinds of obstacle

.Gravity control at the turn

.Real scenes of beautiful

.New UI and characters

.Excited voice of running

.Solve the ultimate mystery of this tunnel
